segments.text: Julia , what's the weather forecast for tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It says a storm may come tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too . I'm always in low spirits when it rains . Are you going out tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have to drive to Washington D . C .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! But you know sometimes the weather forecast is not correct . Maybe tomorrow is a clear day . Who knows ?
segments.speaker: S1
